statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control;
SELECT inspection_result, inspector_name, audit_date FROM quality_control;
SELECT * FROM quality_control ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_result FROM quality_control WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE audit_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT audit_date, inspection_result FROM quality_control WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM quality_control GROUP BY inspector_name ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' OR inspection_result = 'Fail'
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE audit_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM QualityControlAudits;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date, audit_result FROM QualityControlAudits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspector_name ASC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_result FROM Inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlAudits WHERE audit_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM QualityControlAudits WHERE audit_result = 'Fail' AND audit_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND inspection_result = 'Pending' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspector_name, inspection_date DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT * FROM QualityControlAudits qa JOIN Inspections ins ON qa.audit_id = ins.inspection_id WHERE qa.audit_result = 'Pass' AND ins.inspection_result = 'Fail' AND qa.audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY qa.audit_date ASC, ins.inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT audit_name, audit_description FROM audits WHERE audit_type = 'Safety';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE audit_id = 1 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE audit_id = 5;
SELECT inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE audit_id = 3 AND inspection_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE id = 1;
SELECT inspector_name, audit_date FROM quality_control WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT audit_name, audit_description FROM audits WHERE audit_type = 'Regular';
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quality_control;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_audit;
SELECT id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM quality_control_audit WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE passed = TRUE;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_description FROM inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, passed, remarks FROM audit_results WHERE passed = FALSE ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_audit;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM quality_control_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, passed FROM inspection JOIN inspection_results ON inspection.id = inspection_results.inspection_id WHERE passed = true;
SELECT audit_id, COUNT(*) AS total_passed_audits FROM audit_results WHERE passed = true GROUP BY audit_id ORDER BY total_passed_audits DESC;

SELECT inspection.inspection_date, audit.auditor_name, inspection_results.passed FROM inspection JOIN inspection_results ON inspection.id = inspection_results.inspection_id JOIN audit_results ON inspection.id = audit_results.audit_id JOIN quality_control_audit AS audit ON audit.id = audit_results.audit_id WHERE inspection_results.passed = true AND audit_results.passed = true ORDER BY inspection.inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_audit;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product;
SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturer;
SELECT result_id, audit_id, audit_score FROM audit_result ORDER BY audit_score DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspection WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_audit WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY auditor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM product p JOIN manufacturer m ON p.manufacturer_id = m.manufacturer_id WHERE production_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT a.audit_id, a.audit_date, r.audit_score, r.feedback FROM quality_control_audit a JOIN audit_result r ON a.audit_id = r.audit_id WHERE r.audit_score >= 80 ORDER BY a.audit_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM manufacturer m JOIN product p ON m.manufacturer_id = p.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(inspection_id) AS inspection_count FROM inspection GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING inspection_count > 5 ORDER BY inspection_count DESC;
